Portal 2 takes the great premise of the first game, peppers it with a select few new gameplay elements that don't discredit or overshadow the beloved original ones.
It also enriches the story background with characters that while a lot more elaborate than the one character of Portal 1 still fit in the world of the first game ... or rather surround it.

Portal 2 is a perfect sequel and a very good game.

他比起一代的純解謎，更著墨在劇情的修飾
加入雙人的遊戲模式，注重於雙人的合作性
更重要的是，如果覺得解謎太簡單，還有工作坊的支援
如果還是覺得不夠難，更能自己製作解謎地圖

If there's one word I could use to describe this game I'd say it's brilliant. I love everything about this game! The story is great, the characters are unique and extremely memorable, the level design is a complete step up from the first game, and I just adore the Portal gun. I'd recommend this game to any puzzle game fan and even if you're not a puzzle game fan it wouldn't hurt to try out this masterpiece. This is my 3rd favorite game of all time and I don't see that changing anytime soon.
Уитли и Глэдос - тот кого любишь и ненавидишь одновременно...

이 게임은 아직까지도 게임역사상 최고로 아이디어가 좋은 게임일것이다 누가 포탈을 이용해 자유롭게 이용해다니면서 다음 레벨로 가려면 어떻게 가야하는지 고민하고 고민하며 그 퍼즐을 풀어냇을때의 쾌감을 이제는 "포탈"이라는 고유명사가 된 게임을 생각해냇겟는가 거기다 PORTAL2 부터는 스토리가 더욱더 심층적으로 펼쳐져 하는내내 퍼즐과스토리에 즐거움을 느낀다 거기다 숨겨진 요소를 찾아내는 맛도 일품이다 이미 여기까지 하고있다면 당신은 어엿한 포탈팬이다 

아직 이게임을 플레이해보지 않았다면 지금이라도 늦지않았으니 플레이하는것이 인생에 이득이다 어서 사라!! 어서 플레이해라!
Whilst the co-op campaign is different from the regular campaign, the story itself is great. Co-op is fun, and you'll be sure to laugh, cry, and get chills overall.

Simply put, Portal 2 is amazing. With a much longer storyline than its predecessor, smoother gameplay, and better mechanics, Portal 2 is among the few games in my library that I keep going back to. Particularly, I go to Portal 2 for some relaxation every once in a while.

Everything about this game is unmatched.  The antagonist is, in my opinion, one of the best to ever be featured in a video game.  The gameplay is so deep, varied, and just goddamn fun that it keeps me hooked for hours at a time.

Portal defined the genre, Portal 2 perfected it. There can be no other game like it.  Some have tried, all have failed.  This is a must play at any price.

It's good. It's hard. You'll cry. You'll quit in anger.  You'll laugh. You'll contemplate suicide...

Get it.

In 2011, God gave the human race a gift. As lord Gaben descended from the heavens he revealed the game that will now be known to us as Portal 2. Lord Gaben saw its reviews and it was good. This game took all of the ideas and concepts from the original portal and somehow, beyond all human comprehension managed to improve upon them in every way. He then blessed the human race once again, by giving us an abundance of steam sales so that all the humans, no matter how much money that they have can experience the wonder of this game. However, since then times have gotten dark. People plead for a sequel and some even refuse to believe in our lord. Others question his ability to count to three. however, in these end times of valve creating video games we must all keep faith and pray, that one day, our lord gaben may bless us once again.

If you like games that are fun, then get this one. There is a cool sense of humor and very interesting puzzles. I played Portal 2 years ago and it does stand the test of time. Valve, might not want to hear this, but wait till they have a seasonal sale. You can get up to 80% off the price of the game. It would be worth it at regular price, but it is a steal at 80% off.
